text: William Owen Chadwick, OM, KBE, FBA, FRSE (20 May 1916 - 17 July 2015) was a British professor, writer and prominent historian of Christianity. He was also a rugby union player.Owen Chadwick rugby profile ESPN Scrum.com Chadwick was born in Bromley, Kent, England. He died at the age of 99 on 17 July 2015. ==References== Category:1916 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Cambridge Category:English historians Category:English rugby union players Category:Sportspeople from Kent Category:Writers from Kent
title: Owen Chadwick
